SEARCH ModelDefinition WHERE state = 'published' AND ( nodecount(traverse ::IncludedItem:CloudService) =0 AND nodecount(traverse ::IncludedItem:Host ) =0 AND nodecount(traverse ::IncludedItem:MFPart) =0 AND nodecount(traverse ::IncludedItem:Namespace ) =0 AND nodecount(traverse ::IncludedItem:NetworkDevice) =0 AND nodecount(traverse ::IncludedItem:Printer ) =0 AND nodecount(traverse ::IncludedItem:SNMPManagedDevice ) =0 AND nodecount(traverse ::IncludedItem:StorageSystem ) =0 ) SHOW name PROCESSWITH countUnique(0)

panels.description: Service Modelling

options.content: Asset Management

sourceQuery.rawQuery: SELECT DISTINCT `COM:Company`.`Company` AS `Company` FROM `COM:Company` WHERE `Company Type` LIKE '%Operating Company%'

panels.description:
Asset Management
Allows organizations to keep track of IT assets, their physical locations, ownership, and utilization. This is essential for optimizing costs and ensuring compliance

CMDB

Configuration Management Database, is a centralized database that contains information about all the components of an organization's IT infrastructure. These components can include hardware, software, networking devices, servers, databases, applications, and other technology assets. The CMDB serves as a comprehensive repository of information related to an organization's IT environment.

sourceQuery.rawQuery:
SELECT   
   'Obsolescence & Lifecycle Mgmt' AS `Capability`,   
   CASE   
      WHEN ((LocatedAssets * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 10 and (EOLProvided + EOSProvided) * 50 / $UniqueCIs  > 25) and LifeCycleStatuses > 4) and SettingCount = 1 THEN 3  
      WHEN ((LocatedAssets * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 5 and (EOLProvided + EOSProvided) * 50 / $UniqueCIs  > 10) and LifeCycleStatuses > 3) or SettingCount = 1 THEN 2
      WHEN EOSProvided > 0 AND LifeCycleStatuses > 2 THEN 1
      ELSE 0   
   END AS `Score`   
FROM (   
   SELECT 
count(`Site`) AS `LocatedAssets`,
COUNT(DISTINCT `AssetLifecycleStatus`) AS `LifeCycleStatuses`,
COUNT(`EndOfLife`) as `EOLProvided`,
COUNT(`EndOfSupport`) as `EOSProvided`
FROM `AST:BaseElement`
where `Data Set Id` = 'BMC.ASSET' AND `Company` in ($Company) AND
`Create Date` between $__from/1000 and $__to/1000
) AS AssetQuery,
(SELECT COUNT(`Setting Name`) as SettingCount 
from `AR System Configuration Component Setting` 
where `Setting Name` = 'Include-EOL-EOS-In-PCT' and Lower(`Setting Value`) = 'true') as SettingQuery

SELECT   
   'Procurement & Vendor Mgmt' AS `Capability`,   
   CASE   
      WHEN Contracts * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 5 AND `SupplierProvided` * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 5 THEN 3  
      WHEN Contracts * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 1 /* AND CostCenters * 100.0 / HardwareAndSoftwareAssets > 1 */ THEN 2
      WHEN (`Contracts` > 0) /* or CostCenters > 0  */ THEN 1
      ELSE 0   
   END AS `Score`   
FROM (   
   SELECT 
/* COUNT(CASE WHEN `Cost Center` = 'Unallocated' then null when `Cost Center` is null then null else 1 end) AS `CostCenters`, */
COUNT(`Supplier Name+`) as `SupplierProvided`
FROM `AST:BaseElement`
where `Data Set Id` = 'BMC.ASSET' AND
`Create Date` between $__from/1000 and  $__to/1000
) as AssetQuery,
(
   SELECT COUNT(`Request ID`) as `Contracts`
   from `AST:Contract-CIAssociations`
   where `Status` = 'Executed' and `Create-date` < $__to/1000 
   ) as ContractQuery

SELECT   
   'Configuration Item Mgmt' AS `Capability`,   
   CASE   
      WHEN (`Versioned` * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 25) and (CustomClasses > 2 OR CustomAttributes > 2) THEN 3
      WHEN (`ManufacturerProvided` * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 20 ) and (CustomClasses > 0 or CustomAttributes > 0) THEN 2
      WHEN (`ProductProvided` * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 10) and (`Categorized` * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs) > 20 THEN 1  
      ELSE 0  
   END AS `Score`
FROM (   

   SELECT COUNT(`Modified Date`) AS CustomClasses
   from `OBJSTR:Class` where not (Namespace in ('BMC.CORE','BMC.SIM','BMC.FED')) AND 
   NOT (`Last Modified By` in ('Remedy Application Service', 'C2CDemo','Demo')) AND 
   `Modified Date` between $__from/1000 and $__to/1000  
) AS QueryCustomClasses,

(SELECT COUNT(`Modified Date`) as CustomAttributes from `OBJSTR:AttributeDefinition` 
where `Modified Date` between $__from/1000 and $__to/1000 
and `Status` = 'Current' and `Record Status` = 'Active' and
 not (`Last Modified By` in ('Remedy Application Service', 'C2CDemo', 'Demo'))) AS QueryCustomAttributes,
 (SELECT
/* COUNT(DISTINCT `ClassId`) AS `Classes`,*/
COUNT(`Item`) as `Categorized`,
COUNT(`Model`) as `ProductProvided`,
COUNT(`VersionNumber`) as `Versioned`,
COUNT(`ManufacturerName`) as `ManufacturerProvided`
FROM `BMC.CORE:BMC_BaseElement`
where `DatasetId` = 'BMC.ASSET' AND
 `ReconciliationMergeStatus` = 'Ready to Merge' AND 
 `ModifiedDate` between $__from/1000 and  $__to/1000) as AssetQuery

SELECT   
   'Automated Discovery' AS `Capability`,   
   CASE   
      WHEN TotalDatasets > 5 AND (NormalizationRules > 3 and Scanned * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 25 or `HelixDiscovered` * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 25)  THEN 3  
      WHEN Scanned * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs> 5 or `HelixDiscovered` * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 5  THEN 2
      WHEN Scanned * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 1 or `HelixDiscovered` * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 1 THEN 1  
      ELSE 0   
   END AS `Score`   
FROM (   
   SELECT COUNT(`Name`) AS TotalDatasets  
   FROM `BMC.CORE.CONFIG:BMC_Dataset` where `DatasetType`= 'Regular' AND `ModifiedDate` between $__from/1000 and $__to/1000
) AS DatasetCount,
   (
   SELECT COUNT(`ModifiedDate`) AS NormalizationRules   
   from `BMC.CORE.CONFIG:BMC_NormalizationRule`
    WHERE `ModifiedDate` between $__from/1000 and $__to/1000
) AS NormalizationRuleCount,
(SELECT 
COUNT(LastScanDate) AS `Scanned`,
count(`ADDMIntegrationId`) as `HelixDiscovered`,
SUM(case when `NormalizationStatus` = 'Not Normalized' then 0 when `NormalizationStatus` = 'Normalization Failed' then 0 else 1 end) as `NormalizedCIs`
FROM `BMC.CORE:BMC_BaseElement`
where `DatasetId` = 'BMC.ASSET' AND
 `ModifiedDate` between $__from/1000 and $__to/1000
 and `ReconciliationMergeStatus` = 'Ready to Merge') as AssetQuery

SELECT   
   'Integration' AS `Capability`,   
   CASE   
      WHEN `Datasets` > 5 and  (`ITSMAssociations` * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 25) THEN 3  
      WHEN  `Datasets` > 3  and   (`ITSMAssociations` * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 10) THEN 2
      WHEN `Datasets` > 1 OR  (`ITSMAssociations` * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 5)  THEN 1
      ELSE 0   
   END AS `Score`   
FROM 
(SELECT count(`Associations ID`) as `ITSMAssociations` FROM `AST:CMDB Associations` where
`Last Modified Date` BETWEEN $__from/1000 and $__to/1000 ) as CMDBQuery,
(   
   SELECT COUNT(`Name`) AS Datasets  
   FROM `BMC.CORE.CONFIG:BMC_Dataset` where `DatasetType`= 'Regular' AND `ModifiedDate` between $__from/1000 and $__to/1000
) AS DatasetCount

SELECT   
   'Relationship Mapping' AS `Capability`,   
   CASE   
      WHEN BusinessServices > 10 and ImpactRelatedCIs * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 25 and OrphanedCIs * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs  < 5 then 3
      WHEN BusinessServices > 5 and ImpactRelatedCIs * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs > 10 and OrphanedCIs * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs  < 25 then 2
      WHEN BusinessServices > 2 and OrphanedCIs * 100.0 / $UniqueCIs  < 50 then 1
      ELSE 0
   END AS `Score`   
FROM 
(
   SELECT
          SUM(CASE WHEN BR.`HasImpact` = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ImpactRelatedCIs,
          SUM(CASE WHEN BR.`Name` is null then 1 else 0 end) as OrphanedCIs,
          SUM(CASE WHEN BE.`ClassId` = 'BMC_BUSINESSSERVICE' THEN 1 else 0 END) AS `BusinessServices`
          --SUM(CASE WHEN BE.`ClassId` = 'BMC_BUSINESSSERVICE' and NOT (BR.`Destination.InstanceId` IS NULL) THEN 1 else 0 END) AS `BusinessServicesRelationships`


FROM `BMC.CORE:BMC_BaseElement` BE LEFT OUTER JOIN `BMC.CORE:BMC_BaseRelationship` BR
     ON ( BE.`InstanceId` = BR.`Source.InstanceId` OR BE.InstanceId = BR.`Destination.InstanceId`)

WHERE
        BE.DatasetId  = 'BMC.ASSET'
        and BE.`ReconciliationMergeStatus` = 'Ready to Merge'
        AND (BE.ModifiedDate between $__from/1000 and $__to/1000) 
         
) as CIQuery

SELECT   
   'Security & Compliance' AS `Capability`,   
   CASE   
      WHEN AssetRolesUsed > 6 and SmartITAuditLogging > 0 THEN 3  
      WHEN AssetRolesUsed > 3 and SmartITAuditLogging > 0 THEN 2 
      WHEN AssetRolesUsed > 1 or SmartITAuditLogging > 0 THEN 1
      ELSE 0   
   END AS `Score`   
FROM 
   (SELECT COUNT(`People Permission Group ID`) as `AssetUsers`,
COUNT(Distinct `Permission Group`) as AssetRolesUsed
FROM `CTM:People Permission Groups`
WHERE `Product Name` = 'Configuration/Asset Management' and
`Submit Date` < $__to/1000) AS AssetUsersQuery,
   (SELECT
 count(case when Lower(`Setting Value`) = 'true' then 1 else null end) as `SmartITAuditLogging`
from 
`AR System Configuration Component Setting`
where `Setting Name` = 'arsystem.pwa_enable_auditlog') AS LogSettingQuery

panels.title: Adoption Scores

sourceQuery.rawQuery:
SELECT 
count(`Create Date`) as `Assets`,
case when $DataPeriod = 'day' then Date(`Create Date`)
     when $DataPeriod = 'month' then Date(FirstDayOf('month',`Create Date`))
     when $DataPeriod = 'quarter' then Date(FirstDayOf('quarter',`Create Date`))
     else Date(FirstDayOf('year',`Create Date`))
 end AS SubmitDate
from `AST:BaseElement`
where `Create Date` between $__from/1000 and $__to/1000
and `Company` in ($Company)
group by SubmitDate

SELECT count(`Entry ID`) as `PeopleRelationships`,
case when $DataPeriod = 'day' then Date(`Create Date`)
     when $DataPeriod = 'month' then Date(FirstDayOf('month',`Create Date`))
     when $DataPeriod = 'quarter' then Date(FirstDayOf('quarter',`Create Date`))
     else Date(FirstDayOf('year',`Create Date`))
 end AS `SubmitDate`
FROM `AST:AssetPeople`
WHERE `Create Date` BETWEEN $__from/1000 and $__to/1000
group by SubmitDate

SELECT count(`Associations ID`) as `ITSMAssociations`,
case when $DataPeriod = 'day' then Date(`Submit Date`)
     when $DataPeriod = 'month' then Date(FirstDayOf('month',`Submit Date`))
     when $DataPeriod = 'quarter' then Date(FirstDayOf('quarter',`Submit Date`))
     else Date(FirstDayOf('year',`Submit Date`))
 end AS `SubmitDate`
FROM `AST:CMDB Associations` where
`Submit Date` BETWEEN $__from/1000 and $__to/1000
group by SubmitDate

SELECT 
count(`Name`) as `Discovered`,
case when $DataPeriod = 'day' then Date(`LastScanDate`)
     when $DataPeriod = 'month' then Date(FirstDayOf('month',`LastScanDate`))
     when $DataPeriod = 'quarter' then Date(FirstDayOf('quarter',`LastScanDate`))
     else Date(FirstDayOf('year',`LastScanDate`))
 end AS `SubmitDate`
from `AST:BaseElement`
where `LastScanDate` between $__from/1000 and $__to/1000
and `Company` in ($Company)
group by SubmitDate

SELECT
    count(BR.`InstanceId`) AS `CIRelationships`,
    case when $DataPeriod = 'day' then Date(BE.`CreateDate`)
     when $DataPeriod = 'month' then Date(FirstDayOf('month',BE.`CreateDate`))
     when $DataPeriod = 'quarter' then Date(FirstDayOf('quarter',BE.`CreateDate`))
     else Date(FirstDayOf('year',BE.`CreateDate`))
 end AS `SubmitDate`
FROM `BMC.CORE:BMC_BaseElement` BE INNER JOIN `BMC.CORE:BMC_BaseRelationship` BR
     ON ( BE.`InstanceId` = BR.`Source.InstanceId` OR BE.InstanceId = BR.`Destination.InstanceId`)
WHERE 
        BE.DatasetId  = 'BMC.ASSET' AND BE.Company in ($Company)
        AND BE.CreateDate < $__to/1000

        group by SubmitDate

SELECT 
          UserDisplayObjectName AS `UserDisplayObjectName`,
         COUNT(case when `Category` is NULL then 1 else NULL end) AS `UnCategorizedCIs`,
         COUNT(case when `Category` = 'Hardware' then 1 else null end) AS HardwareCIs,
         COUNT(case when `Category` = 'Software' then 1 else null end) AS SoftwareCIs,
         COUNT(case when `Category` <> 'Software' and `Category` <> 'Hardware' then 1 else null end) AS OtherCategoryCIs
FROM 
          `AST:BaseElement` BE 
where 
 `Data Set Id` = 'BMC.ASSET'
GROUP BY 
          UserDisplayObjectName

SELECT 
count(`Instance Id`) as `CIs`,
`AssetLifecycleStatus` AS `AssetStatus`
FROM `AST:BaseElement`
where 
 `Create Date` < $__to/1000
and `Company` in ($Company) and `Data Set Id` = 'BMC.ASSET'
group by `AssetStatus`

SELECT
   COUNT(AP.`Entry ID`) as `PeopleRelationships`,
   AP.Request_Type,
   AP.PersonRole
from `AST:BaseElement` BE INNER JOIN `AST:AssetPeople` AP ON AP.`AssetInstanceId` = BE.`Reconciliation Identity`
where (BE.`Modified Date` between $__from/1000 and  $__to/1000) or (AP.`Modified Date` between $__from/1000 and  $__to/1000)
and BE.`Data Set Id` = 'BMC.ASSET'
group by AP.Request_Type, AP.PersonRole

panels.description:
Comprehensive Inventory

The ability to manage a wide range of configuration items, including hardware, software, network devices, applications, and services. The system should support hierarchical organization and versioning of CIs

sourceQuery.rawQuery:
SELECT
COUNT(`Instance Id`) as `CIs`,
COUNT(DISTINCT `Class Id`) AS `Classes`,
COUNT(`Item`) as `Categorized`,
COUNT(`Model Number`) as `ProductProvided`,
COUNT(`Version Number`) as `Versioned`,
COUNT(`Manufacturer Name+`) as `ManufacturerProvided`
FROM `AST:BaseElement`
where `Data Set Id` = 'BMC.ASSET' AND
 `Modified Date` between $__from/1000 and $__to/1000
/* and `Company` in ($Company) */

panels.title: Configuration Item Mgmt

list.description: Count of Cloud Providers (Azure, AWS etc)
list.label: MultiCloud
list.name: cloud

list.label: Container
list.name: container

list.description: Count of Kubernetes and vCenter clusters in the estate
list.label: Virtualisation
list.name: virtualisation

list.description: Services to be model within Discovery
list.label: Services
list.name: service

list.description: Count of nodes imported from Intelligent Integrations and not scanned with Discovery
list.label: Imported
list.name: imported

current.text: last_update_success and not (host_type has subword 'desktop' or host_type has subword 'client')  and (nodecount(traverse InferredElement:Inference::DiscoveryAccess) or (__resource_unit = 'host' or __resource_unit = 'network'))
current.value: last_update_success and not (host_type has subword 'desktop' or host_type has subword 'client')  and (nodecount(traverse InferredElement:Inference::DiscoveryAccess) or (__resource_unit = 'host' or __resource_unit = 'network'))

list.description: Charts will gather statistics at the specified sample period
list.label: Period
list.name: DataPeriod

list.definition: remedy,{"sql": "SELECT COUNT( `InstanceId`) FROM `BMC.CORE:BMC_BaseElement` where DatasetId = 'BMC.ASSET' AND Company = $Company AND ModifiedDate > $__from/1000 and ModifiedDate < $__to/1000"}
